data.title: Liza Minnelli Wed to Jack Haley Jr.
data.meta_description: Liza Minnelli and Jack Haley Jr are married on Sept 15 in Santa Barbara, Calif; illus
data.text:
SANTA BARBARA, Calif., Sept. 15 (AP) —Liza Minnelli and the film producer Jack Haley Jr. were married today before a few close friends in suburban Montecito.

Miss Minnelli, 28 years old, was an hour late for the ceremony at El Montecito Presbyterian Church. She wore a bright yellow Halston pantssuit and a garland necklace of gold and diamonds. Mr. Haley, 41, is the son of the actor Jack Haley Sr., who starred with Miss Minnelli's mother, the late Judy Garland, in.the films “The Wizard of Oz” and “Pigskin Parade.”

The ceremony was conducted by Judge John Griffin of Beverly Hills. Sammy Davis Jr. and his wife were witnesses.

It was the second marriage for Miss Minnelli, who was recently divorced from the composer Peter Allen, and the first for Mr. Haley, who helped produce and write the narration for the film “That's Entertainment!”
